content: worked * sideways * flat * no increasing or decreasing * beginner friendly crochet pattern finished size width - 21 5 inches - approx height - 73 75 inches - approx yarn four skeins of cascade 220 worsted - 880yds shown in colorway flamingo heather hook size 5 5mm / us i/9 type of instructions this pattern has simple easy to follow written instructions and does not include any charts the pattern is written using american standard crochet terms languages english only terms of use for personal use only do not copy share or sell the pattern in part or whole you may sell the finished item made using this pattern refund policy all digital sales are final pattern support & questions email hellotrulycrochet at gmail com about truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet shawl patterns this version on etsy is an ad-free version of my free pattern
